HERO.DESCRIPTION: Frontend Developer specialized in Angular, with experience in enterprise projects for Banco Santander and Air Europa. Passionate about creating modern, scalable and efficient web applications using the MERN stack.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.TEXT_1: I am Joel Montilla, Frontend developer specialized in Angular, currently working at Plexus Tech on enterprise projects for clients such as Banco Santander and Air Europa.
ABOUT.TEXT_2: My professional path is unique: before dedicating myself to web development, I worked as a Lighting Technician in large-scale events (Freestyle World Tour, Barcelona Christmas Fair, corporate events at ESADE) and as a Warehouse Manager, leading teams and managing complex logistics. This experience provided me with invaluable skills in project management, teamwork and problem solving under pressure.
ABOUT.TEXT_3: I completed the Master Full-Stack Developer at Nuclio Digital School, where I mastered the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), SCRUM agile methodologies, testing, Docker, CI/CD and Cloud deployment. My passion is to create scalable, efficient web applications with clean code following industry best practices.

SANTANDER.TITLE: Banco Santander - Contract Management
SANTANDER.DESCRIPTION: Banking contract management and maintenance system. Development of modules for service contracting, data maintenance and document management for one of the largest banks in Europe.

AIREUROPA.TITLE: Air Europa - Corporate Portal
AIREUROPA.DESCRIPTION: Development and maintenance of web applications for the airline Air Europa. Implementation of functionalities for flight management, bookings and customer services.

TRAILNEST.TITLE: TrailNest
TRAILNEST.DESCRIPTION: Application to create and upload custom hiking routes, allowing users to rate and record them by different levels.
